title: Strange Spice
description: A new vendor is selling 'Deeproot Spice' cheaply. Bakers using it find their bread develops luminescent veining. Ward Chemist Polla suspects Void traces and wants a sample before the spice spreads further through the Ward.

turns.narrative: Vendor Issra found the spice growing near the Crater Ridge Glass Shelf. The spice smells wonderful — like cardamom mixed with something electrical. She clearly isn't hiding anything.
turns.choice_a: Purchase a sample to bring to Polla immediately
turns.consequence_a: Polla identifies Void-adjacent mineral traces — not immediately dangerous in small quantities but cumulative exposure could be.
turns.choice_b: Ask Issra exactly where she found it
turns.consequence_b: Issra pinpoints the Glass Shelf quadrant — an area exposed by the original Scourge breach.

turns.narrative: Polla confirms the spice has Void-crystalline resin baked into its cells — potentially hallucinogenic after weeks of daily bread consumption. Issra is horrified.
turns.choice_a: Help Issra voluntarily recall all sold product
turns.consequence_a: Issra cooperates fully. Most buyers return the spice when warned.
turns.choice_b: Report to the Ward Authority for an official recall
turns.consequence_b: The Authority issues a public notice. More comprehensive but slower. Several bakers are annoyed.

turns.narrative: The recall is complete. Now you must advise on the Glass Shelf source.
turns.choice_a: Recommend it be marked a restricted foraging zone
turns.consequence_a: The Shelf is flagged on expedition maps for future foragers.
turns.choice_b: Recommend Polla's team study it for safe alchemical applications
turns.consequence_b: The safe component of Deeproot Spice becomes a mildly valuable alchemical reagent.

spice_studied.description: Deeproot Spice safely isolated by alchemists.

risk_matrix.critical_failure: The attempt failed quietly. The situation remains unresolved.
